channel.title: Climbing on bonoms.net
channel.description: Recent content in Climbing on bonoms.net

item.title: using math to show off how sexy is a cam
item.description: Hi my beautiful friends, in this little work i’ve done i want to show how a cam works from a mathematical and physical standpoint. So, what is a cam? A cam is a device used to safely (or somewhat) climb on routes where there’re not fixed bolts. On such climbs it is demanded to add so called “quick protection” to arrrest a fall if necessary. Since you’ve come across this blog probably you happily now what i’m talking about, here’s a image of this sexy tool:
